mapper.select: SELECT sc_no companyNo, dc_nm nm, dc_company_no regNo, dc_main_nm headName, dc_addr addr, dc_main_image mainImage, dc_email email, dc_pw pw, dc_tel tel, dc_introduce introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM dress_company

SELECT dc_no AS companyNo dc_nm AS nm, dc_company_no AS regNo, dc_main_nm AS headName, dc_addr AS addr, dc_main_image AS mainImage, dc_email AS email, dc_tel AS tel, dc_introduce AS introduce FROM dress_company WHERE dc_no = #{companyNo}
